content.rendered: Dr Benneth C Nwafor is currently a senior lecturer in Management in the United Kingdom. He has degrees in Accountancy, Master of Business Administration (MBA) and PhD in Business Strategic Management and Human Resource Management. He has worked in both public and private sectors, building project manager and assistant to the auditing panel.
